CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Heavy Machinery relative to Autonomous Drones?
SRP.A: Heavy Machinery is {above} Autonomous Drones in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total vehicle maintenance cost?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Heavy Machinery}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total vehicle maintenance cost?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Electric Trucks}.

VE.Q: What is Railway Cars's Vehicle Maintenance Cost in 1990?
VE.A: Railway Cars's vehicle maintenance cost in 1990 is {1518.16} $/month.

VE.Q: What is Electric Trucks's Vehicle Maintenance Cost in 2006?
VE.A: Electric Trucks's vehicle maintenance cost in 2006 is {689.04} $/month.

VE.Q: What is Railway Cars's Vehicle Maintenance Cost in 1998?
VE.A: Railway Cars's vehicle maintenance cost in 1998 is {1110.66} $/month.

VE.Q: What are the vehicle maintenance cost of Autonomous Drones, Heavy Machinery, and Electric Trucks in 1989?
VE.A: Autonomous Drones's vehicle maintenance cost is {1846.54} $/month, Heavy Machinery's vehicle maintenance cost is {1709.66} $/month, Electric Trucks's vehicle maintenance cost is {1395.91} $/month.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Vehicle Maintenance Cost in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum vehicle maintenance cost is {458.45} $/month.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Vehicle Maintenance Cost in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum vehicle maintenance cost is {4143.72} $/month.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Vehicle Maintenance Cost level recorded for Autonomous Drones?
What is the lowest Vehicle Maintenance Cost level recorded for Autonomous Drones?
EVJ.A: Autonomous Drones's lowest recorded level is approximately {1097.19} $/month in {2002}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Vehicle Maintenance Cost?
SC.A: The average total vehicle maintenance cost is {6303.64} $/month.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Vehicle Maintenance Cost exceed 6460.09 $/month? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Vehicle Maintenance Cost go below 6112.48 $/month? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Vehicle Maintenance Cost fall between 5971.97 and 6600.60 $/month? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 2000 and 2008, was the average total Vehicle Maintenance Cost higher or lower than between 2006 and 2007?
NC.A: The average total vehicle maintenance cost between 2000 and 2008 was {higher} than between 2006 and 2007.

NC.Q: Between 2008 and 2009, did the total Vehicle Maintenance Cost experience a larger or smaller change than between 1992 and 2003?
NC.A: The change in total vehicle maintenance cost between 2008 and 2009 was {smaller} than between 1992 and 2003.

NC.Q: Between 1988 and 1993, did the total Vehicle Maintenance Cost experience a larger or smaller change than between 2006 and 2007?
NC.A: The change in total vehicle maintenance cost between 1988 and 1993 was {larger} than between 2006 and 2007.

NC.Q: Was the total Vehicle Maintenance Cost in 1996 higher or lower than in 2007?
NC.A: The total vehicle maintenance cost in 1996 was {lower} than in 2007.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Heavy Machinery} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Railway Cars, Electric Trucks, Autonomous Drones, Heavy Machinery}.
